WITH LawyersWithMultipleTypesOfEvidence AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT e.CaseID, l.LawyerID
    FROM Evidence e
    INNER JOIN Cases c ON e.CaseID = c.CaseID
    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    GROUP BY e.CaseID, l.LawyerID
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT e.EvidenceType) > 2
), LawyersWithDifferentDocumentTypes AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT d.CaseID, l.LawyerID
    FROM LegalDocument d
    INNER JOIN Cases c ON d.CaseID = c.CaseID
    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    GROUP BY d.CaseID, l.LawyerID
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT d.DocumentType) > 1
), LawyersWithConsultations AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT la.AdviceID, l.LawyerID
    FROM LegalAdvice la
    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON la.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
), LawyersWithMoreThanFourPayments AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, COUNT(*) AS NumPayments
    FROM Payment p
    INNER JOIN Contract c ON p.ContractID = c.ContractID
    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 4
)
SELECT TOP 5
    CONCAT(p.FirstName, ' ', p.MiddleName, ' ', p.LastName) AS FullName,
    l.ExperienceYears,
    lw.NumPayments
FROM Lawyer l
INNER JOIN Person p ON l.PersonID = p.PersonID
INNER JOIN LawyersWithMultipleTypesOfEvidence le ON l.LawyerID = le.LawyerID
INNER JOIN LawyersWithDifferentDocumentTypes ld ON l.LawyerID = ld.LawyerID
INNER JOIN LawyersWithConsultations lc ON l.LawyerID = lc.LawyerID
INNER JOIN LawyersWithMoreThanFourPayments lw ON l.LawyerID = lw.LawyerID
WHERE l.ExperienceYears > 6
ORDER BY lw.NumPayments DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT 
       CONCAT(p.FirstName, ' ', p.LastName) AS FullName,
       COUNT(DISTINCT e.EvidenceType) AS NumEvidenceTypes,
       COUNT(DISTINCT d.DocumentType) AS NumDocTypes,
       COUNT(DISTINCT adv.AdviceType) AS NumAdvices,
       COUNT(DISTINCT pmt.PaymentID) AS NumPayments
FROM Lawyer lw
JOIN Person p ON lw.PersonID = p.PersonID
JOIN Cases c ON lw.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
LEFT JOIN Evidence e ON c.CaseID = e.CaseID
LEFT JOIN LegalDocument d ON c.CaseID = d.CaseID
LEFT JOIN LegalAdvice adv ON lw.LawyerID = adv.LawyerID
LEFT JOIN Contract ct ON lw.LawyerID = ct.LawyerID
LEFT JOIN Payment pmt ON ct.ContractID = pmt.ContractID
WHERE lw.ExperienceYears > 6
GROUP BY lw.LawyerID
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT e.EvidenceType) > 2
   AND COUNT(DISTINCT pmt.PaymentID) > 4
ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT pmt.PaymentID) DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.sql_query: SELECT p.FirstName, p.LastName, lf.FirmName, lf.EstablishedYear, SUM(pmt.Amount) AS TotalPayments, COUNT(DISTINCT v.VerdictID) AS SuccessfulVerdicts, COUNT(DISTINCT cs.CaseID) AS TotalCases, (COUNT(DISTINCT v.VerdictID) / COUNT(DISTINCT cs.CaseID)) AS SuccessRatio FROM Lawyer l JOIN Person p ON l.PersonID = p.PersonID JOIN LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID JOIN Cases cs ON l.LawyerID = cs.LawyerID JOIN Appeal a ON cs.CaseID = a.CaseID JOIN Contract ct ON l.LawyerID = ct.LawyerID JOIN Payment pmt ON ct.ContractID = pmt.ContractID LEFT JOIN Verdict v ON cs.CaseID = v.CaseID WHERE lf.EstablishedYear < 2005 AND a.AppealStatus = 'Отказано' GROUP BY p.FirstName, p.LastName, lf.FirmName, lf.EstablishedYear HAVING SUM(pmt.Amount) > 7000 ORDER BY SuccessRatio DESC LIMIT 6;
queries.gpt-4o_response:

    p.FirstName, 
    p.LastName, 
    l.LicenseNumber, 
    lf.FirmName, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VerdictID) / COUNT(DISTINCT c.CaseID) AS SuccessRatio,
    SUM(pmt.Amount) AS TotalPayments
FROM 
    Lawyer l
JOIN 
    Person p ON l.PersonID = p.PersonID
JOIN 
    LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
JOIN 
    Cases c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
JOIN 
    Verdict v ON c.CaseID = v.CaseID
JOIN 
    Appeal a ON c.CaseID = a.CaseID
JOIN 
    Contract ct ON l.LawyerID = ct.LawyerID
JOIN 
    Payment pmt ON ct.ContractID = pmt.ContractID
WHERE 
    lf.EstablishedYear < 2005
    AND a.AppealStatus = 'Отказано'
GROUP BY 
    p.FirstName, 
    p.LastName, 
    l.LicenseNumber, 
    lf.FirmName
HAVING 
    SUM(pmt.Amount) > 7000
ORDER BY 
    SuccessRatio DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH RejectedAppeals AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT c.CaseID
    FROM Appeal a
    JOIN Cases c ON a.CaseID = c.CaseID
    WHERE a.AppealStatus = 'Отказано'
), SuccessfulVerdicts AS (
    SELECT v.JudgeID, COUNT(*) AS SuccessCount
    FROM Verdict v
    WHERE v.VerdictType IN ('Уголовное Дело', 'Гражданское Дело')
      AND v.Details LIKE '%признан%'
    GROUP BY v.JudgeID
), AllCases AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, COUNT(*) AS TotalCases
    FROM Cases c
    JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
), PaymentsByLawyers AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, SUM(p.Amount) AS TotalPayment
    FROM Lawyer l
    JOIN Contract ct ON l.LawyerID = ct.LawyerID
    JOIN Payment p ON ct.ContractID = p.ContractID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
), FinalResult AS (
    SELECT 
        p.FirstName || ' ' || p.MiddleName || ' ' || p.LastName AS FullName,
        l.LicenseNumber,
        lf.FirmName,
        COALESCE(SuccessfulVerdicts.SuccessCount, 0) / CAST(AllCases.TotalCases AS FLOAT) * 100 AS SuccessRate,
        PaymentsByLawyers.TotalPayment
    FROM Lawyer l
    JOIN Person p ON l.PersonID = p.PersonID
    JOIN LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
    LEFT JOIN SuccessfulVerdicts ON l.LawyerID = SuccessfulVerdicts.JudgeID
    JOIN AllCases ON l.LawyerID = AllCases.LawyerID
    JOIN PaymentsByLawyers ON l.LawyerID = PaymentsByLawyers.LawyerID
    WHERE lf.EstablishedYear < 2005
      AND l.LawyerID IN (SELECT LawyerID FROM Cases WHERE CaseID IN (SELECT CaseID FROM RejectedAppeals))
      AND PaymentsByLawyers.TotalPayment > 7000
)
SELECT *
FROM FinalResult
ORDER BY SuccessRate DESC
LIMIT 6;

    SELECT v.JudgeID, COUNT(*) AS SuccessCount
    FROM Verdict v
    WHERE v.VerdictType IN ('Признан невиновным', 'Решение в пользу истца')
    GROUP BY v.JudgeID
), AllCasesPerLawyer AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, COUNT(c.CaseID) AS TotalCases
    FROM Lawyer l
    LEFT JOIN Cases c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
), PaymentsByLawyers AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, SUM(p.Amount) AS TotalPayment
    FROM Lawyer l
    JOIN Contract c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
    JOIN Payment p ON c.ContractID = p.ContractID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
    HAVING SUM(p.Amount) > 7000
), FinalResult AS (
    SELECT 
        CONCAT(p.FirstName, ' ', p.MiddleName, ' ', p.LastName) AS FullName,
        l.LicenseNumber,
        lf.FirmName,
        COALESCE(SuccessfulVerdicts.SuccessCount / NULLIF(AllCasesPerLawyer.TotalCases, 0), 0) * 100 AS SuccessRate,
        PaymentsByLawyers.TotalPayment
    FROM Lawyer l
    JOIN Person p ON l.PersonID = p.PersonID
    JOIN LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
    JOIN RejectedAppeals ra ON l.LawyerID = ra.CaseID
    JOIN PaymentsByLawyers ON l.LawyerID = PaymentsByLawyers.LawyerID
    LEFT JOIN SuccessfulVerdicts ON l.LawyerID = SuccessfulVerdicts.JudgeID
    LEFT JOIN AllCasesPerLawyer ON l.LawyerID = AllCasesPerLawyer.LawyerID
    WHERE lf.EstablishedYear < 2005
)
SELECT *
FROM FinalResult
ORDER BY SuccessRate DESC
LIMIT 6;

WITH CriminalAppeals AS (
    -- Подсчет количества успешных апелляций по каждому суду
    SELECT c.CourtID, COUNT(*) AS SuccessfulAppeals
    FROM Appeal a
    JOIN Cases ca ON a.CaseID = ca.CaseID
    JOIN Court c ON ca.CourtID = c.CourtID
    WHERE a.AppealStatus = 'Принято'
      AND ca.CaseType = 'Уголовное дело'
    GROUP BY c.CourtID
), AllAppeals AS (
    -- Общее количество апелляций по каждому суду
    SELECT c.CourtID, COUNT(*) AS TotalAppeals
    FROM Appeal a
    JOIN Cases ca ON a.CaseID = ca.CaseID
    JOIN Court c ON ca.CourtID = c.CourtID
    WHERE ca.CaseType = 'Уголовное дело'
    GROUP BY c.CourtID
), PaymentsByCourts AS (
    -- Суммы платежей адвокату по каждому суду
    SELECT c.CourtID, SUM(p.Amount) AS TotalPayment
    FROM Payment p
    JOIN Contract co ON p.ContractID = co.ContractID
    JOIN Lawyer lw ON co.LawyerID = lw.LawyerID
    JOIN Cases ca ON lw.LawyerID = ca.LawyerID
    JOIN Court c ON ca.CourtID = c.CourtID
    GROUP BY c.CourtID
), EvidencesByCourts AS (
    -- Количество различных видов доказательств по каждому суду
    SELECT e.CaseID, COUNT(DISTINCT e.EvidenceType) AS NumOfEvidences
    FROM Evidence e
    JOIN Cases ca ON e.CaseID = ca.CaseID
    GROUP BY e.CaseID
), CourtsWithCriteria AS (
    -- Объединение всех необходимых условий
    SELECT cr.CourtID, cr.CourtName, 
           COALESCE(SuccessfulAppeals.SuccessfulAppeals, 0) AS SuccessCount,
           COALESCE(AllAppeals.TotalAppeals, 0) AS TotalAppeals,
           CASE WHEN AllAppeals.TotalAppeals != 0 THEN CAST((SuccessfulAppeals.SuccessfulAppeals * 100 / AllAppeals.TotalAppeals) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) ELSE NULL END AS SuccessRate,
           PaymentsByCourts.TotalPayment,
           E.NumOfEvidences
    FROM Court cr
    LEFT JOIN CriminalAppeals ON cr.CourtID = CriminalAppeals.CourtID
    LEFT JOIN AllAppeals ON cr.CourtID = AllAppeals.CourtID
    LEFT JOIN PaymentsByCourts ON cr.CourtID = PaymentsByCourts.CourtID
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT DISTINCT CaseID, MAX(NumOfEvidences) OVER(PARTITION BY CaseID) AS NumOfEvidences
        FROM EvidencesByCourts
    ) E ON cr.CourtID IN (SELECT CourtID FROM Cases WHERE CaseID = E.CaseID)
    WHERE PaymentsByCourts.TotalPayment > 12000
      AND E.NumOfEvidences >= 3
)
-- Итоговый результат
SELECT CourtName, SuccessRate
FROM CourtsWithCriteria
ORDER BY SuccessRate DESC
LIMIT 5;

    SELECT c.CourtID, v.VerdictID, a.AppealID, a.AppealStatus
    FROM Cases c
    INNER JOIN Verdict v ON c.CaseID = v.CaseID
    INNER JOIN Appeal a ON c.CaseID = a.CaseID
    WHERE c.CaseType = 'Уголовное дело'
), 
PaymentSums AS (
    SELECT c.CourtID, SUM(p.Amount) AS TotalPayment
    FROM Cases c
    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    INNER JOIN Contract co ON l.LawyerID = co.LawyerID
    INNER JOIN Payment p ON co.ContractID = p.ContractID
    GROUP BY c.CourtID
), 
EvidenceCounts AS (
    SELECT e.CourtID, COUNT(e.EvidenceID) AS NumOfEvidenceTypes
    FROM Cases c
    INNER JOIN Evidence e ON c.CaseID = e.CaseID
    GROUP BY e.CourtID
), 
SatisfiedAppeals AS (
    SELECT ca.CourtID, COUNT(*) AS SatisfiedCount
    FROM CriminalAppeals ca
    WHERE ca.AppealStatus = 'Принято'
    GROUP BY ca.CourtID
), 
TotalAppeals AS (
    SELECT ca.CourtID, COUNT(*) AS TotalAppealsCount
    FROM CriminalAppeals ca
    GROUP BY ca.CourtID
)
SELECT cr.CourtName, 
       ROUND((sa.SatisfiedCount * 100.0 / ta.TotalAppealsCount), 2) AS SatisfactionPercentage
FROM Court cr
INNER JOIN SatisfiedAppeals sa ON cr.CourtID = sa.CourtID
INNER JOIN TotalAppeals ta ON cr.CourtID = ta.CourtID
INNER JOIN PaymentSums ps ON cr.CourtID = ps.CourtID
INNER JOIN EvidenceCounts ec ON cr.CourtID = ec.CourtID
WHERE ps.TotalPayment > 12000 AND ec.NumOfEvidenceTypes > 3
ORDER BY SatisfactionPercentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

),

    FROM Lawyer l
    INNER JOIN Cases c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID
), 
Successful_Ratio AS (
    SELECT l.LawyerID, 
           COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN sc.VerdictType IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::FLOAT / t.TotalCases::FLOAT, 0) AS SuccessRatio
    FROM Lawyer l
    LEFT JOIN Successful_Cases sc ON l.LawyerID = sc.CaseID
    INNER JOIN Total_Cases t ON l.LawyerID = t.LawyerID
    WHERE l.ExperienceYears >= 5 AND l.Specialization IN ('Корпоративное право', 'Интеллектуальная собственность')
    GROUP BY l.LawyerID, t.TotalCases
), 
Top_Lawyers AS (

    FROM Lawyer l
    INNER JOIN Successful_Ratio s ON l.LawyerID = s.LawyerID
    ORDER BY s.SuccessRatio DESC
    LIMIT 4
), 
Final_Result AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT lf.*
    FROM Top_Lawyers tl

    INNER JOIN LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
)

    SELECT c.CaseID, c.CaseNumber, c.Status, c.CourtID, c.LawyerID, MAX(h.HearingDate) AS LastHearingDate

    WHERE c.CaseType = 'Налоговое преступление'
    GROUP BY c.CaseID, c.CaseNumber, c.Status, c.CourtID, c.LawyerID
),

    FROM Evidence e
    GROUP BY e.CaseID
),

    SELECT tcc.CaseID, tcc.CaseNumber, tcc.Status, etpc.NumDistinctEvidenceTypes, 
           TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MIN(e.SubmissionDate), tcc.LastHearingDate) AS DaysDifference
    FROM TaxCrimeCases tcc
    INNER JOIN Evidence e ON tcc.CaseID = e.CaseID
    INNER JOIN EvidenceTypesPerCase etpc ON tcc.CaseID = etpc.CaseID
    GROUP BY tcc.CaseID, tcc.CaseNumber, tcc.Status, etpc.NumDistinctEvidenceTypes, tcc.LastHearingDate
)

    FROM Client c
    INNER JOIN Person p ON c.PersonID = p.PersonID
    WHERE p.Gender = 'Ж'

    INNER JOIN FemaleClients fc ON ct.ClientID = fc.ClientID

    WHERE p.PaymentDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR AND p.Amount > 9000
), RelevantLegalDocs AS (
    SELECT CASE_ID, COUNT(DISTINCT DocumentType) AS DocTypesCount

    SELECT j.JudgeID, l.LawyerID, COUNT(*) AS NumJointCases

    INNER JOIN Lawyer l ON cs.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
    INNER JOIN RelevantLegalDocs rld ON cs.CaseID = rld.CASE_ID
    GROUP BY j.JudgeID, l.LawyerID
)

JOIN Payment pm ON c.CaseID IN (SELECT CaseID FROM Contract WHERE ContractID = pm.ContractID)
JOIN LegalDocument ld ON c.CaseID = ld.CaseID
WHERE cp.Gender = 'Ж'
AND pm.PaymentDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 YEARS'
AND pm.Amount > 9000
GROUP BY j.FirstName, j.LastName, lw.FirstName, lw.LastName
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ld.DocumentType) >= 2
ORDER BY NumOfJointCases DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.sql_query: SELECT lf.FirmName, COUNT(v.VerdictID) AS TotalEconVerdicts, AVG(DATEDIFF(v.VerdictDate, cs.FilingDate)) AS AvgVerdictDelay FROM LawFirm lf JOIN Lawyer l ON lf.LawFirmID = l.LawFirmID JOIN Cases cs ON l.LawyerID = cs.LawyerID JOIN Verdict v ON cs.CaseID = v.CaseID WHERE v.VerdictType = 'Экономическое Дело' AND v.VerdictDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY lf.FirmName HAVING COUNT(v.VerdictID) > 3 ORDER BY AvgVerdictDelay ASC LIMIT 5;

GROUP BY lf.FirmName
HAVING COUNT(v.VerdictID) > 3

SELECT lf.FirmName, 
       AVG(DATEDIFF(v.VerdictDate, c.FilingDate)) AS AvgDaysToVerdict
FROM Verdict v
JOIN Cases c ON v.CaseID = c.CaseID
JOIN Lawyer l ON c.LawyerID = l.LawyerID
JOIN LawFirm lf ON l.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
WHERE v.VerdictType = 'Экономическое Дело'
  AND v.VerdictDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY lf.FirmName
HAVING COUNT(v.VerdictID) > 3
ORDER BY AvgDaysToVerdict
LIMIT 5;

SELECT
    lf.FirmName,
    AVG(JULIANDAY(v.VerdictDate) - JULIANDAY(c.FilingDate)) AS AvgVerdictTime
FROM LawFirm lf
JOIN Lawyer l ON lf.LawFirmID = l.LawFirmID
JOIN Cases c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
JOIN Verdict v ON c.CaseID = v.CaseID
WHERE
    c.CaseType = 'Экономическое дело'
    AND v.VerdictDate BETWEEN DATE('now', '-12 months') AND DATE('now')
GROUP BY
    lf.FirmName
HAVING
    COUNT(v.VerdictID) > 3
ORDER BY
    AvgVerdictTime
LIMIT 5;

queries.meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct_respon:
SELECT 
    lf.FirmName, 
    AVG(DATEDIFF(v.VerdictDate, c.FilingDate)) AS AvgVerdictDuration,
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VerdictID) AS TotalVerdicts
FROM 
    LawFirm lf
JOIN 
    Lawyer l ON lf.LawFirmID = l.LawFirmID
JOIN 
    `Cases` c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
JOIN 
    Verdict v ON c.CaseID = v.CaseID
WHERE 
    c.CaseType = 'Экономическое дело'
    AND v.VerdictDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
GROUP BY 
    lf.FirmName
HAVING 
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.VerdictID) > 3
ORDER BY 
    AvgVerdictDuration ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
    lf.FirmName, 
    AVG(DATEDIFF(v.VerdictDate, c.FilingDate)) AS AverageVerdictDuration
FROM 
    LawFirm lf
JOIN 
    Lawyer l ON lf.LawFirmID = l.LawFirmID
JOIN 
    `Cases` c ON l.LawyerID = c.LawyerID
JOIN 
    Verdict v ON c.CaseID = v.CaseID
WHERE 
    c.CaseType = 'Экономическое дело' 
    AND v.VerdictDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
GROUP BY 
    lf.FirmName
HAVING 
    COUNT(v.VerdictID) > 3
ORDER BY 
    AverageVerdictDuration
LIMIT 5;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH EconomicVerdicts AS (
    SELECT v.VerdictID, c.CaseID, v.JudgeID, v.VerdictDate, c.FilingDate,
           TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, c.FilingDate, v.VerdictDate) AS DaysToVerdict,
           j.CourtID
    FROM Verdict v
    INNER JOIN Cases c ON v.CaseID = c.CaseID
    INNER JOIN Judge j ON v.JudgeID = j.JudgeID
    WHERE c.CaseType = 'Экономическое Дело'
      AND YEAR(v.VerdictDate) >= YEAR(NOW()) - 1 -- Filter verdicts from the past year
), FirmVerdictCounts AS (
    SELECT lf.LawFirmID, COUNT(*) AS NumEconomicVerdicts
    FROM EconomicVerdicts ev
    INNER JOIN Court co ON ev.CourtID = co.CourtID
    INNER JOIN Judge ju ON ev.JudgeID = ju.JudgeID
    INNER JOIN Lawyer lw ON ju.PersonID = lw.PersonID
    INNER JOIN LawFirm lf ON lw.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
    GROUP BY lf.LawFirmID
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 -- Only firms with more than 3 economic verdicts
), AverageDaysPerFirm AS (
    SELECT lf.LawFirmID, AVG(ev.DaysToVerdict) AS AverageDays
    FROM EconomicVerdicts ev
    INNER JOIN Court co ON ev.CourtID = co.CourtID
    INNER JOIN Judge ju ON ev.JudgeID = ju.JudgeID
    INNER JOIN Lawyer lw ON ju.PersonID = lw.PersonID
    INNER JOIN LawFirm lf ON lw.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
    GROUP BY lf.LawFirmID
)
SELECT lv.LawFirmID, lf.FirmName, AVG(AverageDays) AS AverageDaysToVerdict
FROM AverageDaysPerFirm adpf
INNER JOIN FirmVerdictCounts fvc ON adpf.LawFirmID = fvc.LawFirmID
INNER JOIN LawFirm lf ON adpf.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
GROUP BY lv.LawFirmID, lf.FirmName
ORDER BY AverageDays ASC
LIMIT 5;
queries.gigachat_response_ru:
WITH EconomicVerdicts AS (
    SELECT v.VerdictID, c.CourtID, v.JudgeID, v.VerdictDate, c.FilingDate,
           TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, c.FilingDate, v.VerdictDate) AS DaysToVerdict
    FROM Verdict v
    JOIN Cases c ON v.CaseID = c.CaseID
    WHERE v.VerdictType = 'Экономическое Дело'
      AND YEAR(v.VerdictDate) >= YEAR(NOW()) - 1 -- Последние 12 месяцев
), JudgesWithEconomicVerdicts AS (
    SELECT j.JudgeID, j.CourtID, COUNT(*) AS NumOfVerdicts
    FROM EconomicVerdicts ev
    JOIN Judge j ON ev.JudgeID = j.JudgeID
    GROUP BY j.JudgeID, j.CourtID
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 -- Более трех экономических дел
), AverageDaysPerCourt AS (
    SELECT e.CourtID, AVG(e.DaysToVerdict) AS AverageDays
    FROM EconomicVerdicts e
    JOIN JudgesWithEconomicVerdicts jwev ON e.CourtID = jwev.CourtID
    GROUP BY e.CourtID
), CourtsWithLawFirms AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT c.CourtID, lf.LawFirmID
    FROM Court c
    JOIN Cases ca ON c.CourtID = ca.CourtID
    JOIN Lawyer lw ON ca.LawyerID = lw.LawyerID
    JOIN LawFirm lf ON lw.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
)
SELECT lf.FirmName, adpc.AverageDays
FROM AverageDaysPerCourt adpc
JOIN CourtsWithLawFirms clf ON adpc.CourtID = clf.CourtID
JOIN LawFirm lf ON clf.LawFirmID = lf.LawFirmID
ORDER BY adpc.AverageDays ASC
LIMIT 5;
